Trigger.name: casting
Trigger.script: deleteLine() cecho("\n<steel_blue>Cast the line " .. matches[2] .. " feet.") fdistance = matches[2]

regexCodeList.string: ^You cock back your arm and smoothly cast a line into the nearby water. You judge the cast at about (\d+) feet\.$
^You cock back your arm and smoothly cast your line over the railing into the nearby water. You judge the cast at about (\d+) feet\.$
^You cock back your arm and smoothly cast a line into the nearby water. You judge the cast at about (\d+) feet\.$

Trigger.name: fishing highlight 2
Trigger.script: deleteLine() cecho("\n<DeepPink>Fish swam out " .. matches[2].. " feet.") fdistance = fdistance + matches[2] cecho("<LightGoldenrod> Gotta reel in " .. fdistance .. " feet.") if catch then cecho("<red> Caught a " ..catch.."!!") end

regexCodeList.string: ^The fish tries to swim with the hook, drawing (\d+) feet of line\.$
^Your rod bends slightly as your fish tries to escape its barbed tether, running out (\d+) foot of line\$.
^The fish you've hooked struggles against the line and runs it out (\d+) feet\.$
^You feel the fish tugging on your line, drawing it out about (\d+) foot\.$
^Your rod bends slightly as your fish tries to escape its barbed tether, running out (\d+) feet of line\.$
^You feel the fish tugging on your line, drawing it out about (\d+) feet\.$
^Your rod bends slightly as your fish tries to escape its barbed tether, running out (\d+) feet of line\.$
Your fish struggles and swims firmly away from you, drawing out (\d+) feet of fishing line.
The fish tries to swim with the hook, drawing (\d+) foot of line.
^Your rod bends slightly as your fish tries to escape its barbed tether, running out (\d+) foot of line\.$
^The fish on your line shows its power by running out (\d+) feet of line\.$
^Tugging powerfully, your fish draws out (\d+) feet of line\.$
^Dodging back and forth furiously, your fish draws out (\d+) feet of line\.$
^With a pull that threatens to rip the pole from your hand, the fish you've hooked runs out (\d+) feet of line\.$
^With an arm-wrenching burst of power, the fish you've hooked runs out (\d+) feet of fishing line\.$

Trigger.name: fishing highlight
Trigger.script: deleteLine() cecho("\n<LawnGreen>You have ".. matches[2].. " feet left to reel in!") fdifference = fdistance - matches[2] cecho("<medium_orchid> You reeled in ".. fdifference .. " feet.") fdistance = matches[2] if catch then cecho("<red> Caught a " ..catch.."!!") end

regexCodeList.string: You have (\d+) feet of line left to bring in\.$
You have (\d+) foot of line left to bring in\.$

Trigger.name: fish!
Trigger.script: if selectString( line, 1 ) > -1 then setFgColor( 255,204,204 ) setBgColor( 51,0,51 ) resetFormat() end fdistance = false catch = false

regexCodeList.string: With a final tug, you finish reeling in the line and land a
You reel in the last bit of line and your struggle is over. You've landed a
You reel in the last bit of line and your struggle is over.
With a style born of skill, you reel in a
You quickly reel in a

Trigger.name: fishinghightlight 3
Trigger.script: deleteLine() catch = matches[2], true cecho("\n<DeepPink>Fish swam out " .. matches[3].. " feet.") fdistance = fdistance + matches[3] cecho("<LightGoldenrod> Distance left to reel is " .. fdistance .. ".") cecho("<red> Caught a " .. catch .."!!")

regexCodeList.string: ^With a power born of the Seagod, a (whiskerknot skrei|stripefish|two-headed fish|giant hatchetfish|coelacanth|spotted fangtooth|duskfin tuna|redfin tuna) leaps from the water explosively, running the line out (\d+) feet\.$

^Leaping from the water in a frenzy to escape, a (whiskerknot skrei|stripefish|two-headed fish|giant hatchetfish|coelacanth|spotted fangtooth|duskfin tuna|redfin tuna) runs out (\d+) feet of your line\.$

Trigger.name: Snapline
Trigger.script: cecho("\n<red>AWW SNAP!") cecho("\n<yellow>AWW SNAP!") catch = false fdistance = false

regexCodeList.string: As the fish strains your line beyond its breaking point, it snaps suddenly, costing you your fish and bait.
Throwing away your existing bait, you carefully thread a
You carefully thread a
You reel your line in completely.
You take (a worm|a minnow|a sand flea|a shrimp|a shelled clam|a crab|a mudsucker|a hunk of octopus|a rock bass|a marble carp) from (a|an) (.*) fishing pole.$
Your line snaps or fouls and you lose your bait.
A (.*) has decayed to dust inside of pole#(\d+)$
Your line fouls and you lose your bait.

ScriptGroup.name: svo Fishing Distance by Trilliana
ScriptGroup.script:
function fishdistPrio(_, module) if module ~= "svo (fishdist)" then return end setModulePriority(module, 1) end
registerAnonymousEventHandler("sysInstall", "fishdistPrio")
svo.modules_version = svo.modules_version or {} svo.modules_version["svo (fishdist)"] = 1

Script.name: svo_load_fishingdistance
Script.script:
function svo_load_fishingdistance() svo.adddefinition("@fishdist", "svo.telldistance()") -- returns the value of the 'baited' 'no line out' or the distance function svo.telldistance() if fdistance == "baited" then return "<light_sky_blue>baited" elseif fdistance == "lineout" then return "<dark_green>Line out, no bait!" elseif fdistance then return "<slate_blue>"..fdistance.." feet out" else return "<medium_sea_green>no line out" end end
if type(svo.conf.fishhighlight) ~= 'nil' then if svo.conf.fishhighlight then enableTrigger"svo Fishing Distance by Trilliana" else disableTrigger"svo Fishing Distance by Trilliana" end end
svo.config.setoption("fishhighlight", { vconfig2string = true, type = "boolean", onenabled = function () enableTrigger"svo Fishing Distance by Trilliana" svo.echof("<0,250,0>Will%s show highlights for fishing.", svo.getDefaultColor())
if not string.find(svo.conf.customprompt, "@fishdist", 1, true) then svo.config.set("customprompt", svo.conf.customprompt .." @fishdist", false) svo.echof("Added the fishing distance to your custom prompt as well.") end end, ondisabled = function () disableTrigger"svo Fishing Distance by Trilliana"
if string.find(svo.conf.customprompt, "@fishdist", 1, true) then svo.config.set("customprompt", svo.conf.customprompt:gsub(" @fishdist", ""), false) svo.echof("Removed the fishing distance tag from your custom prompt.") end
svo.echof("<250,0,0>Won't%s show highlights for fishing.", svo.getDefaultColor()) end, onshow = function (defaultcolour) fg("gold") echoLink("fishing dist:", "", "svo Fishing Distance by Trilliana", true) fg(defaultcolour) echo(" Fishing highlights are ") fg("a_cyan") echoLink(svo.conf.fishhighlight and "enabled" or "disabled", "svo.config.set('fishhighlight', "..(svo.conf.fishhighlight and "false" or "true")..", true)", "Click to "..(svo.conf.fishhighlight and "disable" or "enable").." fishing highlight triggers", true) fg(defaultcolour) echo(".\n") end}) end
